title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 27 July 2012 - XWiki

13:44 <cinux> has joined #xwiki  
13:46 <cinux> hey, i have a problem after the installation of xwiki. i can not reach it. i got the message that directories are missing. So i have do some symbol links. But now i think tomcat isn hearing on any ports. Can somebody help me? :)  
13:47 <cinux> i have xwiki install over the repository for debian  
13:48 <@cjd\_> "the message that directories are missing" is a bit vague, could you paste what you're seeing to a pastebin?  
13:53 <cinux> cjd\_: its look like somethink like this : http://pastebin.com/unKU8FPL but since i do "ln -s /var/lib/tomcat6/shared/ shared" (also for server) this. i dont get the warnings.
